pages.text: $(li)The Forgotten is a variation of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeleton$(/l) that can be found in deep underground of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Their $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l) are tipped with Blindness arrows making you hard to see.$(br)$(li)When you're blinded, they will charge at you with their $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l), switching back to the $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l) once the effect ends.
$(li)They may drop a $(l:patchouli:armors/forgotten_hat)Forgotten Hat$(/l) upon death.
